name: Bounce-A-Lot
description:
Bounce-A-Lot, the friendly little ball that likes to bounce, get him to the portal with out falling or getting popped by the spikey aliens!

Bounce-A-Lot likes to bounce, you can't stop him, move him left and right with 'A' &'D' or the arrow keys and time the bounce to work in your favour.

This game is still being developed so please leave some feed back in the comments section.
